content: This article **needs additional citations for verification**. Please help improve this article by adding citations to reliable sources. Unsourced material may be challenged and removed. *Find sources:* "Joo Seng" – news **·** newspapers **·** books **·** scholar **·** JSTOR *(June 2020)* *(Learn how and when to remove this message)*Subzone of Toa Payoh Planning Area in Singapore **Joo Seng** ([Chinese](/wiki/Chinese_language): 裕成) is a subzone located in [Toa Payoh](/wiki/Toa_Payoh) in the [Central Region](/wiki/Central_Region,_Singapore) of [Singapore](/wiki/Singapore). There are some condominiums and houses in the area. It is also where the [Gurkha Contingent](/wiki/Gurkha_Contingent) is based. There are many [Gurkhas](/wiki/Gurkhas) and their families living there in private flats. ## Location Joo Seng is located in mid-northeast Singapore forming part of the central district. It is situated just south of [Hougang](/wiki/Hougang) and borders [Serangoon](/wiki/Serangoon) and Upper Aljunied. ## Amenities There are a few amenities for residents living in Joo Seng. There is a [Prime Supermarket](/wiki/Prime_Supermarket), several [Kopitiam](/wiki/Kopitiam) (coffeeshops), a [laundromat](/wiki/Laundromat), a [hair salon](/wiki/Hair_salon), a [hotel](/wiki/Hotel) and various general goods stores. [Bartley MRT station](/wiki/Bartley_MRT_station) links Joo Seng with [Junction 8](/wiki/Junction_8), [Serangoon](/wiki/Serangoon) Bus Interchange and Serangoon Town Centre. The nearby [Woodleigh MRT station](/wiki/Woodleigh_MRT_station) also provides easy access to places such as [Punggol](/wiki/Punggol), [Dhoby Ghaut](/wiki/Dhoby_Ghaut) and [Clarke Quay](/wiki/Clarke_Quay). ## Education There are a few educational institutions in Joo Seng. - [Cedar Primary School](/wiki/Cedar_Primary_School) - [Cedar Girls' Secondary School](/wiki/Cedar_Girls%27_Secondary_School) - [Bartley Secondary School](/wiki/Bartley_Secondary_School) - [Maris Stella High School](/wiki/Maris_Stella_High_School) There used to be another school, Elling Primary School, which closed down in the mid-1990s. - [Mount Vernon, Singapore](/wiki/Mount_Vernon,_Singapore) - [Outer Ring Road System](/wiki/Outer_Ring_Road_System) - [Bartley MRT station](/wiki/Bartley_MRT_station)
title: Joo Seng
